title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Introducing the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set, a must-have addition to your toolbox! This set includes a 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and a 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer, perfect for all your hammering and clawing needs. 

Crafted with high carbon steel, the hammer heads are heat treated and polished with a rust-preventative coating for maximum durability. The rubber handles with TPR coating provide a comfortable, non-slip grip, while the fiberglass construction and vibration absorption technology make handling a breeze.

Whether you're driving or pulling nails, these hammers deliver maximum striking strength and nail-pulling leverage. With a well-balanced design and convenient hang hole for storage, the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set is robust, easy to handle, and perfect for any DIY project. Upgrade your toolkit today!

The high carbon steel hammer heads are heat treated and polished with a rust-preventative coating, ensuring durability and longevity. The handles are made of rubber with TPR coating, featuring an ergonomic design and a non-slip textured surface for comfortable and secure grip. The fiberglass construction and vibration absorption technology make these hammers easy to handle and reduce strain on your wrists.

With the ability to drive and pull nails with maximum force and leverage, these hammers are perfect for all hammering and clawing applications. The well-balanced weight and convenient hang hole storage feature make these hammers a must-have for any professional or DIY enthusiast.

Upgrade your toolbox with the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set and experience the power and convenience of these high-quality tools!
